name: @tq-bit/qache
description: Zero-dependency, lightweight caching module for Node.js and the browser

scripts.release: npm run pre-release && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run pre-release && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run pre-release && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.pre-release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run commit
scripts.commit: git commit -am "release: latest" && git push origin master

author: tobi@q-bit.me
